mapper.select: SELECT i.inNum, i.buyNum, r.whseCode, c.clientCompany, i.rawCode, r.rawName, i.inCount, s.stockCount, r.rawPrice, i.inPrice, i.inDate, i.inEmpId, i.inState FROM inMaterial i join rawMaterial r on i.rawCode = r.rawCode join stock s on i.rawCode = s.rawCode join clients c on i.clientCode = c.clientCode order by i.inNum desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
